title: "Fractal Wallpapers"
content: Welcome to our website, where you can find a stunning collection of wallpapers featuring abstract shapes inspired by the Mandelbrot set. Our monochromatic color scheme creates a sleek and modern look that will elevate any device's display. Whether you're looking for a new background for your desktop, phone, or tablet, we have a variety of options to choose from. With our easy-to-navigate website, finding the perfect wallpaper has never been easier. So why settle for a boring default wallpaper when you can have a unique and eye-catching design? Explore our collection today and give your device the upgrade it deserves!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by the Mandelbrot set, in a monochromatic color scheme."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
